# tidyclinical

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of tidyclinical is to provide a tidy like analysis for clinical research, especially for RCT research.

## Installation

You can install the released version of tidyclinical from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("tidyclinical")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(tidyclinical)
## basic example code
```

It's just under develop, **don't** use it now!
